    • handleMsg

      public void handleMsg​(Msg m, int src, java.lang.String tag)
      Handles received message marker. If process is white it turns it red. Closes required channel. Prints out everything in channel if it is marked its local state and input channels.
      Specified by:
      handleMsg in interface MsgHandler
